KEY = getSecret(name = 'firebaseTenxorKey')['key']
DOMAIN = 'tenxor.sh'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

shortenLink[source]

shortenLink(key, longLink, domain, timeout=10)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
#generate short link
longLink = 'https://villazoom.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/pinpin081120.mp4?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAVX4Z5TKDTDNSIOHY%2F20201109%2Fap-southeast-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20201109T140516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=8d68583f4be0b5576b3cb4f89c66502d44bb804bcdbc2c361b69c643a861d844'
shortLink = shortenLink(KEY, longLink, DOMAIN)
print(shortLink)
